info.name: Cursor - Skyrim - KMV
info.description:
Skyrim Cursor by KMV.

Global.
32x32.

Includes two additional cursors; Black :hover and :active.
Integrated into CSS (base64) - No external mirror utilized.

Source:
1) https://tes-mods.fandom.com/wiki/The_Elder_Scrolls_Mods_Wiki
2) https://images.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110213131405/elderscrolls/es/images/9/91/CursorSkyrim.png

For Skyrim Cursor only (without extra Pointers :hover & :active), see:
https://userstyles.org/styles/176290/

Stylus recommended:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/
info.additionalInfo:
20191002 Added two additional cursors, for Links and Link-Click
20191009 Added more links to :hover
20191011 Added :hovers
20191014 Added :hovers
20191015 Removed "li a *" from :hovers. Adjusted code to accommodate for "input" and forced native main cursors on "ul".
20191110 Changed Description for Chrome users.
20191228 Added general pointer "button" property (id)
20191229 Added :hover + :active on volume sliders and menu button on userstyles.org. Added "div" to forceful list to override unwanted custom pointers.
20200128 Added general pointer "close" class+id.
20200201 Pointers added.
20200423 Added Button Pointers.
20200509 Broader compatibility with hovers
20200513 Added pointers and clickers.
20200710 Added pointers and clickers to Reddit.
20200721 Fullscreen Cursor Hide on selected pages integrated. More to come in the future.
20200723 Update of description and cursors.
20200803 Update of pointers
20200805 Added a pointer to YT following the recent update (New Menu Bar).
20200821 Tweaked cursors in general volume sliders, and integrated Vimeo. Added a new pointer to Duckduckgo.

style.css:
/*
/*
/* i really want this to be global */
/* 
/* Cursor - Skyrim - KMV
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/175086/
/*
/* Cursor only (no pointers)
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/176290/
/*
/* Stylus recommended:
/* https://add0n.com/stylus.html
/* 
/* Other Themes by KMV:
/* https://userstyles.org/users/370722
/*
/* Contact:
/* https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/
/*
*/


/* Main Cursor */

html,
body,
#main-content *
{
    cursor: url("data:image/x-icon;base64,"), default;
}


/*Main Cursor - Forced*/

input,
ul,
[class*="fluid"],
body[class*="res-v"], body[class*="res-nightmode"][class*="res-v"],

/*Experimental*/

::select,
::selection
{
  cursor: text !important;
}


/*Fullscreen Cursor Hide*/

body.navia :-moz-full-screen,
[class*="fullscreen"] [class*="inactive"],
[class*="fullscreen"][class*="inactive"],
[class*="inactive"],
.jw-flag-fullscreen.jw-flag-user-inactive div.jw-wrapper.jw-reset div.jw-media.jw-reset video.jw-video.jw-reset,
.player.player-cursor-hide,
[style="cursor: none"],
.reddit-video-player-root::after,
.ytp-autohide
{
    cursor: none!important;
}
